reuters.title: IC INDUSTRIES <ICX> NAMES KARL BAYS AS CHAIRMAN
reuters.body: IC industries Inc said Karl Bays has been elected chairman and chief executive officer effective July one. William Johnson, who is recovering from a recent stroke, has been named chairman emeritus and will continue as a member of the board. Bays is currently chairman of Baxter Travenol Laboratories Inc <BAX>. Reuter 
